Text:
Ghost Lab is screwed up.  I missed its airing on Science channel because there wasn't really any notification it would be aired then.
Also, Science channel somehow aired next weeks episode of Ghost Lab while Discovery channel will be airing this weeks episode.
They will be posted in due time.
thanks very much. we don't get this in Canada.

I don't have the luxury of a DVR or a TV card for the PC.  Obtaining these episodes is either a mad hunt online or actually paying for them and converting them into a DRM-less Xvid.
If anybody would like to send a nifty DVR or PCI TV card this way for the holidays, I'd be much obliged and able to post piles of episodes.  That is however much my upload speeds will allow.  My ISP is one of those butthead monopolizing companies that throttles bandwidth simply because they can.
oh by the way there is one more episode to air on the 7th of January

@ korygoblue

Not this again.  If there really is, post a link of your source for this information.  

I've been told before there's another episode of a season when there really wasn't.

No offense, but prove it.
